content: Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang is an optional miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. One of several possible frog guai bosses you can defeat, this one lurks in the Valley of Ecstasy, and has the power of frost on its side.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang is an optional miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. One of several possible frog guai bosses you can defeat, this one lurks in the Valley of Ecstasy, and has the power of frost on its side.
